changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_guild_ranks') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_guild_ranks GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.get_guild_ranks @guild_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT rank_id, name, rights, money_withdrawal_per_day FROM dbo.Guild_Ranks WHERE guild_id = @guild_id ORDER BY rank_id ASC
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_guild_ranks') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_guild_ranks GO
